body.name: XGIMI Halo+ 1080P Portable Projector, 700 ISO Lumens with Harman Kardon Speakers, Auto Keystone Correction, Auto Focus, Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance, Intelligent Screen Alignment, Android TV 10.0
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 58 mins
features: 1080P Super-Bright Image: 1920×1080 FHD picture complimented with LED-powered hyper-focused 700 ISO lumens (4K content also supported).
Fully Portable: Equipped with a 59.454Wh built-in battery and minimalist design, providing 2.5hrs of big-screen entertainment anywhere, anytime.

Intelligent Screen Adaption: Our industry-leading Intelligent Screen Adaption(ISA) technology simplifies usability and setup. Halo+ boots up and perfectly adjusts your display in seconds thanks to its Auto Keystone Correction, AI Object Avoidance, Autofocus, and Intelligent Screen Alignment.

Android TV 10.0: Android TV + Google Play provides seamless access to 5000+ apps like Disney+, HBO Max, and Prime Video. Regardless if you’re binge-watching the latest show or adventuring outdoors, Halo+ was built to entertain.
2 x 5W Harman Kardon Speakers: Halo+ emits clean, distortion-free Hi-Fi sound with ample bass response. Also compatible with Dolby Audio, DTS-HD/Studio, and Bluetooth 5.0.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Ultra Portable 2 Enormous Scale 3 Exceptional Brightness 4 Harman Kardon

Auto Focus Automatically focuses the display until it’s crystal-clear Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Scales the projection automatically to avoid obstacles. Intelligent Screen Alignment Automatically adjusts the projected image to match your screen size Auto Keystone Correction Aligns the image with the projection area based on vertical/horizontal +/-40° angles.

A Whole New World of Entertainment Android TV + Google Play provides seamless access to 5000+ apps like Disney +, HBO Max, and Prime Video. Regardless if you’re binge-watching the latest show or adventuring outdoors, Halo+ was built to entertain Halo+ Works with Your Voice The ever so easy-to-use Google Assistant integrated into the remote controller lets you open apps, search for videos, and much more instantly Supersize Your Favorite Content With Chromecast built-in, you can wirelessly cast apps, games, and more directly to Halo+ from your Android or Apple devices.

Which is the Best for You? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! This is “THE ONE”
reviews.reviewText: So I purchased the Wemax dice before getting the xgimi halo + because I didn’t want to spend the extra money, but I couldn’t help myself in getting this as well to compare for myself to see any real differences between the two. Either way they are both up there in price. Although I do really like the Wemax dice, and at first I thought to myself “wow this thing is awesome and the speakers sound great, I don’t think I need to even open the halo +” but boy was I wrong.After testing both, there’s just a few things that I can’t live with out in terms of features and service. (Auto keystone correction, customer service )I’ll write a list of things that I like better on the halo + vs wemax dicePROS of Halo+-sound qualityNow I thought the dice sounded great, but after playing the same audio side by side, the halo has a much more natural cleaner sound coming out of it, it’s actually so much better i changed my view of the dice speaker and wanted to just mute it.- the remote control on the halo feels better in terms of “clicky” of the presses. Feels superior in quality and I do like that it’s white, easier to find if misplaced.- picture quality 5%-10% better (not noticeable unless you really take a look side by side)-halo is slight brighter since the lumens are higher-halo has kick stand which is really helpful, more than I thought it would be.- BIGGEST PRO is auto keystone adjustment (MUST HAVE) after playing with this feature, I’m in love, so much that this alone sold me on it because it saves so much time, it’s smart and when you have kids that love to shake a table a bit, that can throw the screen off enough to bother you , and make you re adjust to perfection. With halo + , it’s all done for you!-manual keystone on the dice was annoying because it just took way too long to get corners where I wanted them, with halo + it was much faster.-with halo I can stick in a fire stick and have it powered via usb drive (with wemax it said it isn’t providing enough power, that I would need to plug the fire stick into an outlet, which defeats the purpose of being portable)Halo + pushes more power to the fire stick!Not only that but i needed a extension adapter because the shell of the dice restricted the fire stick to fit flush since it’s pretty thick. With the halo + , I had no issues since the shell had no restrictions as it was flush.-OS on the halo + was 10-15% faster and everything just felt more snappy.-CUSTOMER SERVICE- I contacted Wemax dice and it took them a couple days to respond (only option is email) and they just kept asking for videos when I clearly told them the issue I was having, which is that the auto keystone wasn’t working. Turns out, it didn’t have one. Only the halo + did.With XGIMI though, they have a US customer care number that operates surprisingly later than most companies and you will get a live person, but even if you didn’t, they emailed me back same day! Not only that they went above and beyond to take care of my needs. This to me was worth the difference I paid alone because I know that I won’t have to worry about anything ever happening to my projector. They stand behind their product, they will go the extra mile for you, trust me they are just awesome!This started as me getting a portable projector because my wife asked for one for the family to watch movies outside in the back yard, to me getting really excited about my new toy. This thing has so much more uses than just a back yard theater, I’ll be taking this thing everywhere I go. It’s a portable 30”-120” tv when ever you want! Especially hotels for my business trips. XGIMI is an amazing brand that I’m very happy to have discovered!Over all it’s SO worth spending the extra $200 for the halo+ , I am a person that cares about the small details in tech and XGIMI NAILED IT on this projector! If you are on the fence, let this be your sign to get it, you will be much happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nearly Perfect Portable Cinema Experience
reviews.reviewText: The XGIMI Halo Plus Projector has genuinely transformed my movie nights and travels. It's not just a projector; it's a portable cinema experience in a compact form. The sound quality is outstanding – loud, crisp, and so good that I often find no need for an external speaker. However, should you want one, the Bluetooth connectivity is flawless.Its intelligent screen adaption technology is a boon, automatically adjusting the projected image to match your screen size. This feature, combined with the autofocus, ensures a vivid and clear viewing experience every single time. Everyone who has witnessed this projector in action has been nothing short of impressed.However, a few things could enhance this already stellar product. Firstly, the projector lacks onboard controls, making the remote indispensable. Lose it, and you're in a bind. A padded carrying case would have been a great addition, considering its size and the fact that it's meant to be portable. It's a tad bulky, but given the myriad of features packed into it, it's understandable.To sum it up, the XGIMI Halo Plus is a must-have for anyone looking for top-notch portable entertainment. I never leave for a trip without it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2nd times the charm
reviews.reviewText: The 1st projector I received didn’t work properly as the keystone correction kept giving me a trapezoid picture. The process to try and fix it was quite frustrating through their customer support. They eventually replaced it with one that works perfect and also gave me a 10% refund for the trouble.The projector itself has a fantastic picture; including during the daytime. I also bought a Roku stick so I’m able to watch cable outside since Roku has an Xfinity app. I greatly look forward this summer for family movie nights outside!It has a Harmon Kardon speaker, but I used Bluetooth to connect my Sonos Move. It works fantastic and I’m able to place the speaker directly behind my ginormous projector screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this projector! The picture quality is great, the sound is good, and the projector itself is a lot lighter than I expected. The Android 10 operating system works very well. I only wish the battery would last a little longer (about 1 1/2 hours), but all in all this was a great purchase. I originally tried the Nebula Solar portable (another real good projector, loved the 3 hour battery), but I had a few minor problems with it, so I had to return it. But,. All in all, I’m glad I ended up with the solar+, the brightness and color rendition is so much better. Get it!

Previamente tuve el WEMAX Dice y puedo decir que este es significativamente mejorRecomiendo comprar un Google Chromecast 4k para una mejor experiencia ya qué con esta combinación puedes aplicar imagen a Full HD con 60 Hz en Netflix, y aunque este no tenga esa resolución la escala de la imagen a 4K hace que se vea mejor solo que irá a 30 Hz.Además si tienes Google Home, puedes apagar y prender el proyector con el asistente de Google habilitando alguna de las configuraciones del proyector. Hay algunos videos donde también te muestran como mejorar la imagen. Llevo solo un día con el proyector si veo algo que discutir lo agregaré más tarde

I received the product and found the sound is strangeI compare it to my TV and found there is definitely something wrong with the sound.I felt it is defective product so I sent it back.BTW, the seller doesn't provide free shipping label and I paid the shipping cost out of pocketThen it is delivered and the seller is not processing it until I contacted them.Then after, they refund 80% of the total order and said the it is totally ok. They charge 20% as restocking fee??? they just provided a so-called report and said it is totally fine. When I asked if they have any other proof, they just ghostedI want my money back! Don't deal with this seller "Canada Best Electronics"How can they call themselves that????
Picture quality not upto the mark and HD movies were pixelating. The EPSON EF12 mini is a better one than this
Perfecto para transportar y pasar un buen rato !

Al inicio, enfrenté un dilema al decidir cuál sería mi primer proyector. Parte de mi incertidumbre se debía a mi inexperiencia con estos dispositivos; apenas los había encendido y apagado. Además, mis únicas referencias eran los proyectores ocasionalmente usados en clases, que no me proporcionaban mucha información para tomar una decisión informada.No quería desperdiciar mi dinero, así que empecé a investigar. Aunque llegué a comprender conceptos técnicos como la relación entre los lúmenes y la nitidez de la imagen, me costaba visualizar cómo sería tener un proyector en mi propia casa. "¿Ofrecerá una buena calidad de imagen? ¿Realmente me será útil?", me preguntaba.Después de mucha investigación, descubrí que este proyector se destacaba como una de las mejores opciones en términos de relación calidad-precio. Me decidí a tomar el riesgo, y no podría estar más contento con la decisión. La calidad de la imagen es excelente y cumple con todas mis expectativas y necesidades.Contexto de UsoPlaneaba usar el proyector principalmente durante la noche, en reuniones familiares, encuentros con amigos o para disfrutar de una velada de películas y videojuegos. La habitación en la que lo uso es bastante oscura, sin luz directa, y la superficie de proyección es una pared blanca con textura.DurabilidadPor último, pero no menos importante, puedo confirmar que el proyector es muy resistente. Prefiero no entrar en detalles sobre cómo llegué a esa conclusión, pero definitivamente puedes tener la confianza de transportarlo sin preocupaciones.En resumen, podrías encontrar opciones más caras o más baratas, pero si estás proyectando en un ambiente con poca luz y en una superficie adecuada, te garantizo que también estarás muy satisfecho con tu compra.
